card.name: Ardoz, Cobbler of War
card.text: HasteWhenever Ardoz, Cobbler of War or another creature enters the battlefield under your control, that creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.{3}{R}: Create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token with haste. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Balan, Wandering Knight
card.text: First strikeBalan, Wandering Knight has double strike as long as two or more Equipment are attached to it.{1}{W}: Attach all Equipment you control to Balan.

card.name: Coldsteel Heart
card.text: Coldsteel Heart enters the battlefield tapped.As Coldsteel Heart enters the battlefield, choose a color.{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.

card.name: Isu the Abominable
card.text: You may look at the top card of your library any time.You may play snow lands and cast snow spells from the top of your library.Whenever another snow permanent enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {G}, {W}, or {U}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Isu the Abominable.

card.name: Karn Liberated
card.text: +4: Target player exiles a card from their hand.−3: Exile target permanent.−14: Restart the game, leaving in exile all non-Aura permanent cards exiled with Karn Liberated. Then put those cards onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Kibo, Uktabi Prince
card.text: {T}: Each player creates a colorless artifact token named Banana with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add {R} or {G}. You gain 2 life."Whenever an artifact an opponent controls is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control that's an Ape or Monkey.Whenever Kibo attacks, defending player sacrifices an artifact.

card.text: {T}: Each player creates a colorless artifact token named Banana with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add {R} or {G}. You gain 2 life."Whenever an artifact an opponent controls is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control that's an Ape or Monkey.Whenever Kibo attacks, defending player sacrifices an artifact.

card.name: Kiki-Jiki, Mirror Breaker
card.text: Haste{T}: Create a token that's a copy of target nonlegendary creature you control, except it has haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Spectral Sailor
card.text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)Flying{3}{U}: Draw a card.
